description: TransVerse Platform Configuration - Single source of truth for all TransVerse servers and utilities

comments.server_setup_delay: Seconds to wait before proxy scans for active servers (allows all servers to finish startup)
comments.max_proxy_setup_buffer: Additional seconds for proxy file creation and propagation
comments.proxy_port: Port where reverse proxy listens (must not conflict with game/hub ports)
comments.max_ports_in_each_range: Maximum number of ports to scan in each range. There are 3 ranges: PROD (backend+frontend prod), DEV (backend+maybe frontend dev), and DEV-VITE (frontend dev-vite)
comments.first_port_in_prod_range: Starting port for PROD range (backend production)
comments.first_port_in_dev_range: Starting port for DEV range (backend dev)
comments.first_port_in_dev_vite_range: Starting port for DEV-VITE range (frontend dev-vite)
comments.status_check_interval_minutes: Interval in minutes for periodic status blurbs printed to console (0 = disabled, only show on startup)
